name: River Raid 2017
description:
A remake of a classic Atari 2600 game "River Raid", made as an educational project during GameDev School course.

It aims to recreate all core features of the original, improve it's look and interface usability.

Main features:
  • 5 levels
  • 3 types of enemies
  • fuel system
  • hot seat multiplayer
Credits:
  • Paweł Kuczkowski (Design)
  • Dorota Halicka (Graphic Design)
  • Tomasz Hagström (SFX / Production)
  • Marcin Pazdan (Coding)
  • Paweł Sołtys (Coding)
  • Eric Skiff (Theme Song "Underclocked" - Underunderclocked mix)
